1.content: Right, let's get this started then, which character do you want to pick?
1.title: Which character will you pick?

11.content: Alrighty, so you've chosen the title character; Micky Mouse. Now to pick the kink of your choice.
11.title: Mickey Mouse

111.content:
So you've gone with fattening up Mickey, good choice. How'd you want to do it?



1. Willingly gains weight (E.G. He's always wanted to be fat and now he has the chance to do it)


2. Forced to gain weight (E.G. He get's captured and force fed by a character)


3. Writers choice (This option is open for you to go down any other weight gain scenario path you'd like)
111.title: Weight gain

112.content:
Right, so you've gone with making that mouse into a balloon, good choice. How'd you want to do it?


1. Accidental inflation (E.G. He somehow manages to land on a hose and inflate at a steady rate)

2. Gets captured (E.G. A character captures him and inflates him against his will)

3. Writers choice (This option is for you to pick anyother inflation scenario you'd prefer)
112.title: Inflation

12.content: Ah good, so you've chosen Minnie Mouse. Now to pick the kink of your choice.
12.title: Minnie Mouse

13.content: Well then, so you've chosen Goofy. Now to pick the kink of your choice.
13.title: Goofy

14.content: Interesting, so you've chosen Donald Duck. Now to pick the kink of your choice.
14.title: Donald Duck

15.content: Here's your second selection of characters to choose from.
15.title: More Characters

154.content: Very interesting, so you've chosen Max Goof. Now to pick the kink of your choice.
154.title: Max Goof

info.brief_description: This is an interactive story in which Mickey Mouse and friends get fat and/or inflated
info.description:
This is a revival of the (Currently at time of writing) abandoned interactive story of the same name.

The rules for this story are as follows:

#1. No Instant weight gain (E.G. a character gains 500lbs suddenly)
#2. No scat, watersports or slob
#3. No serious violence (E.G. death, killing, ect.)
#4. Nothing too hardcore or too extreme (E.G. graphic depictions of sex, excessive swearing) Keep it moderatly PG-13+
#5. Straight and same-sex relationships are allowed, just keep in mind of the age rating
#6. Stories have to be more then one sentence long, unless you're setting up different path options for the writer/reader
#7. All characters in this story are aged 18+ or have been aged up. Any chapter which has a character being involved who is underrage will revoked.

More rules might be added depending on how things go. If you have any questions, just message me.
